A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow\, should not of read the audience reviews.  So much hate.  I loved the movie.  Was it perfect? No\, nothing is.  But if you go into the movie without \"knowing\" what would make it the best movie ever\, it is a delightful addition to the cannon.  So Snoke wasn't who you wanted him to be\, so Luke is not the Jedi you expected.  \"This (movie) is not going to go the way you think\" and that's perfectly all right with me
